name: "alive with hope" card
description:
Created in honor of Breast Cancer Awareness Month, this inspiring card measures 4.25 inches by 5.5 inches and is blank on the inside.  With an intricate hand-embellished background, pattern-pressed floral accent, and black satin ribbon, this card is a stylish way to send along a message of hope.  

Please note that because of its dimensional design, this card may fit snugly inside its accompanying envelope and/or require extra postage.  

Check out our FAQ page or contact us about a custom specialty card order.  

Ships within 1 day of order completion.

name: envelope wraps {fetching foilage}
description:
Warm up a plain ol' envelope with some seasonal style!  

Sold in packs of 10, our envelope wraps measure 8.5 by 2.5 inches and provide ample space for mailing and return addresses to be written in.  Hand-stamped and self-adhesive, these lovelies work well with our solid and patterned envelopes, or any standard greeting card-sized envelope (A2).  

Don't forget to let your imagination wander!  You can use envelope wraps to label packages, file folders, spice up everyday notebooks, and whatever else suits your fancy.  

Check out our FAQ page or contact us about an order of customized envelope wraps.  

Please allow 2 to 3 business days for processing before your wraps ship!

name: everyday notelets
description:
Wonderful for sharing with your book club {or for keeping all to yourself}  these notelets provide a stylish place to jot down quotes, questions, and lists. 

These mini notepads measure 5 by 2.5 inches and include 10 pieces of blank white paper on the inside.   Each notelet is finished with a coordinating eyelet, allowing you to fan the book open or tie with your favorite string.  With a variety of uses, such as bookmarks, purse notes, and children's writing pads, these little pads are a list-maker's dream!


Sold in packs of 6 coordinating designs and ships within 1 day of order completion.

name: family monogram print
description:
This 8 by 10 inch monogrammed design is printed on Kodak Professional Supra Endura paper.  Available in 3 striking color combinations, this ready-to-frame print can be customized with a family's name and "date established", making it the perfect housewarming or anniversary gift!

If you don't see a specific color you'd like, please contact us about a custom color for this print.

Please allow 2 to 3 business days for processing before your print ships!

name: patterned envelopes {fun in form}
description:
What a way to spice up your everyday correspondence! 

Sold in packs of 10, our colorful patterned envelopes measure 4.375 inches by 5.75 inches and can accommodate any standard-sized greeting card or stationery (A2).  Featuring rounded, peel-and-stick flaps and made of durable 65lb. card stock, these sweet staples coordinate beautifully with our handcrafted stationery and envelope wraps.  

Check out our FAQ page or contact us about ordering a custom design of patterned envelopes.   

Please allow 2 to 3 business days for processing before your envelopes ship!
